title: Chasing After You
description: Author Susan Cochran's third book in the Lake Tahoe series brings humor, heart, and steamy heat back to Lake Tahoe.Is it too late to rediscover the spark that was never fully extinguished?Luke Grant is a man with a badge every woman notices. Except for one. She was everything that was right in his world, then she disappeared from his life. Multiple tours in Afganistan couldn't erase the memory of her. Years later, she returned and for Luke, time stood still. Can he forgive her for the past and claim her as his again?Dr. Blair O'Rourke ran away to follow her dream and her drive cost her a chance at love. She's a single mom trying to move on with her life after returning to Lake Tahoe. She can handle anything that comes through the doors of her ER. Until a certain lawman with a devilish smile and a perfect body appears. When he holds her in his powerful arms, is she brave enough to risk her heart for a second chance at love?
author: Susan  Cochran
